Class MiniMapGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • MiniMapGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants

    public class MiniMapGUI
extends javax.swing.JFrame
    "MiniMapGUI" is a class of the "World of Zuul: The lesser Evil" game. It represents a Window which can convert a matrix of int values to a series of images which represents a map of the game. It uses Java Swing and the GridLayout
    Version:
    2017.12.08
    Author:
    Anton Luca-Dorin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
